llm_output.rationale: The table on page 61 provides dimensional requirements for different zoning districts. For the R-3A Single-Family Residential district, it lists a minimum living area per dwelling of 1,000 sq ft. However, note [3] indicates this requirement does not apply to structures regulated under the NC Residential Code for one and two-family dwellings. Since we're specifically looking for single-family homes, this exception likely applies, meaning there may not be an enforceable minimum unit size for single-family homes in this district.
